CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Table 2 , the HOMO level of PQCDTB ( -5.24 eV ) was higher than that of PCZDTB by 0.2 eV because the HOMO level of the QC derivative was higher than that of carbazole.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO level of PQCDTB |
| PQCDTB |
| HOMO level of PCZDTB |
| PCZDTB |
| HOMO level of QC derivative |
| carbazole |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO level of PQCDTB |
| PQCDTB |
| HOMO level of PCZDTB |
| PCZDTB |

The term "HOMO level" refers to the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital level, which is a material property related to the electronic structure of a molecule. Therefore, both the HOMO levels and the corresponding materials (PQCDTB and PCZDTB) are considered material names in this context.
